review: Love it so far fast to get installed and lots of movies with my prime membership
author: Orley Setterington

review: Bought it prerelase two months ago for one purpose, to use it at hotels.  When buying the unit, that feature, called captive portal access said coming soon.  It is more than two months later and the feature still says coming soon.  The stick has been laying in the box while I wait.  Read the more than 100 reviews of customers upset about this.  Giving it another two months before I attempt to return this useless crap.  Amazon, fix this already.
author: Reviewer

review: Excellent! Easy to use, works with all my online movie services and no streaming delays.
author: LindaFae

review: It's super!!!!!!!  What a great gadgets $39.00
author: Carolyn S. Thomas

review: Works great.  Easy to set up.  I downloaded the app for my Droid phone also .. and it works great as well as the remote that came with the stick.I've already recommended buying one to 3 close friends
author: Kevin

review: Very nice and functional unit. I have received and replaced my Roku TV units and Apple TV unit with Fire sticks. Excellent feature set and speed, nice form, good to receive all necessary parts in the box (including the HDMI extender - nice touch!).  I do hope the UI becomes cleaner and less cluttered over the next several releases.
author: Tej Dhawan

review: Very easy to install and then navigate.
author: Sue Wu
